description: Complete call center integration with PBX systems, real-time call management, queue systems, and call center operations

test_cases.name: Call Center Page Load
test_cases.description: Verify the call center page loads correctly with all components
steps: Verify page title contains 'Call Center' or 'Telephony'
Verify tabs are displayed (Dashboard, Calls, Agents, Queues, Settings)
Verify loading state is handled properly
Verify error state is handled gracefully
test_cases.expected_result: Page loads with all components visible and functional

test_cases.name: Call Center Dashboard Display
test_cases.description: Verify the call center dashboard displays key metrics correctly
steps: Verify active calls count is displayed
Verify queued calls count is shown
Verify agent availability metrics are displayed
Verify hourly and daily stats are displayed
Verify alerts are shown when applicable
test_cases.expected_result: Call center dashboard displays all key metrics and real-time data

test_cases.name: Call Management Display
test_cases.description: Verify call management displays calls correctly
steps: Verify each call shows caller ID, called number, direction, status, duration, agent
Verify call direction is clearly indicated
Verify call actions (View, Transfer, Hold, Mute, Record) are available
Verify call filters and search are available
Verify call history is properly paginated
test_cases.expected_result: Call management displays all calls with complete information

test_cases.name: Call Actions and Controls
test_cases.description: Test call actions and real-time call controls
steps: Verify call actions are properly logged
Verify call status updates in real-time
test_cases.expected_result: Call actions and controls work correctly with real-time updates

test_cases.name: Agent Management Display
test_cases.description: Verify agent management displays agents correctly
steps: Verify each agent shows name, email, status, active calls, queues
Verify agent availability is clearly indicated
Verify agent actions (View, Edit, Assign Queue, Set Status) are available
Verify agent filters and search are available
Verify agent performance metrics are shown
test_cases.expected_result: Agent management displays all agents with complete information

test_cases.name: Agent Status Management
test_cases.description: Test agent status updates and management
steps: Verify status changes are reflected in real-time
test_cases.expected_result: Agent status management works correctly with real-time updates

test_cases.name: Queue Management Display
test_cases.description: Verify queue management displays queues correctly
steps: Verify each queue shows name, queue number, current calls, current agents, wait time
Verify queue status is clearly indicated
Verify queue actions (View, Edit, Add Member, Configure) are available
Verify queue filters and search are available
Verify queue performance statistics are shown
test_cases.expected_result: Queue management displays all queues with complete information

test_cases.name: Queue Configuration and Management
test_cases.description: Test queue configuration and member management
steps: Test adding a member to the queue
Test removing a member from the queue
test_cases.expected_result: Queue configuration and management work correctly

test_cases.name: PBX Provider Management
test_cases.description: Test PBX provider configuration and management
steps: Verify PBX providers section is displayed
Verify provider actions (View, Edit, Test, Delete) are available
Test adding a new PBX provider

test_cases.name: Real-time Call Monitoring
test_cases.description: Test real-time call monitoring and updates
steps: Verify active calls are updated in real-time
Verify agent status changes are reflected immediately
Verify queue status updates in real-time
Verify call duration timers are accurate
Verify call status changes are immediate
Verify alerts are shown for important events
test_cases.expected_result: Real-time call monitoring works correctly with immediate updates

test_cases.name: Call Recording and Transcription
test_cases.description: Test call recording and transcription functionality
test_cases.expected_result: Call recording and transcription work correctly

test_cases.name: Call Analytics and Reporting
test_cases.description: Test call analytics and reporting functionality
steps: Verify call volume trends are shown
Verify agent utilization metrics are shown
Verify call quality metrics are displayed
test_cases.expected_result: Call analytics and reporting work correctly

test_cases.name: Call Filtering and Search
test_cases.description: Test call filtering and search functionality
steps: Use status filter to filter calls
Verify only calls with selected status are shown
Use direction filter to filter calls
Verify only calls with selected direction are shown
Use date range filter to filter calls
Verify only calls within date range are shown
Use search to find specific calls
test_cases.expected_result: Call filtering and search work correctly

test_cases.name: Call Center Alerts and Notifications
test_cases.description: Test call center alerts and notifications
steps: Verify alerts are displayed when applicable
Verify queue volume alerts are shown
Verify agent availability alerts are displayed
Verify SLA breach alerts are shown
Verify system status alerts are displayed
test_cases.expected_result: Call center alerts and notifications work correctly

test_cases.name: Error Handling
test_cases.description: Verify graceful handling when API fails or data is missing
steps: Simulate API failure (network error or 500 response)
Verify page remains functional after error
Verify retry mechanism works if available
Verify empty state is handled gracefully
Verify WebSocket connection errors are handled
Verify PBX connection errors are displayed
test_cases.expected_result: Page handles API failures gracefully with proper error display
